transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan. Hello ji se baat kar rahi hai. Dynamic consultancy.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir Parth baat kar raha hun IndiaMART head office se baat kar raha hun sir.
Customer: Haan ji. Senior manager sir IndiaMART se baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Haan boliye na.
Executive: Actually morning mein baat bhi hua tha aapka Vimal ke sath bas wohi jaanna tha kuch issue aa raha tha services se sir.
Customer: Feedback gaya tha hamare pass.
Customer: Sir issue kya hai unka to bahut badhiya prompt reply vagaira sab kuch aata hai.
Customer: Lekin actually mere ko abhi kam se kam panch che mahina hua hai.
Customer: Mera jo profile hai woh total licensing factory licensing work ka hai.
Customer: Ji ji. Government approvals.
Customer: Right. Abhi mere ko.
Executive: Sorry.
Executive: Jaise FSSAI license ho gaya na sir FSSAI license.
Customer: Haan matlab yahi mera mera ke sab prohibition department narcotics.
Customer: Aur uske baad mein petroleum exclusive department. Barabar hai uske factory license hai ESIC hai PF hai.
Customer: GIDC work hai. To ye sabhi mera matlab profile mein hai right abhi mere ko jo aa rahe hai lead woh khali PAN card ke liye matlab inquiries aa rahi hai. Usme bhi jo aana chahiye woh inquiry kabhi Bihar se aata hai kabhi UP se aata hai.
Customer: Jo mere area mein nahi aata hai right aur kuch jo inquiries aati hai woh fake inquiries aati hai matlab ek to koi response nahi karta hai proper ya fir documents nahi hote hai aise matlab alag alag issue hai.
Executive: Woh to maine.
Customer: To maine mera jo profile hai uske hisab se mere ko kuch dusra kuch aa hi nahi raha hai mere profile mein kam se kam 15 se 20 strong mere services hai.
Customer: Usme mere ko khali PAN card PAN card PAN card ka aa raha hai iska koi meaning hi nahi hai na sir.
Executive: Sir location ka to aisa kuch issue aapke sath hai nahi matlab PAN card to main samajh gaya sir PAN card mein utni mature leads nahi hoti log inquiry kar dete hain check karne ke liye kaise kaise kya hai lekin jo location ka problem hai sir woh to nahi hoga sir aapke case mein aap kam to pan India basis pe hi karte honge na sir matlab aapko kisi bhi location se koi lead aayegi aapko to service deni hai sir ultimately.
Customer: Nahi na sir vaisa nahi hota hai na.
Executive: Nahi hota hai.
Customer: Suppose mera jo maine unko bataya tha kya Gujarat mein particular jaise maine bataya tha unko kya Bharuch hai Surat hai Baroda hai barabar hai particular agar Gujarat ke bhi mere ko orders aate hain to main unke sath mein barabar proper kam kar sakta hun abhi agar mere ko agar UP ka kam bolenge to possible nahi hai sir.
Customer: Kyunki waha pe jo government officers hote hain unke sath mein licensing vagaira sab kuch.
Executive: Unke sath coordinate nahi ho payega.
Customer: Nahi ho payega nahi ho payega.
Executive: Sir major aapka sir jo Bharuch hai aur nearby location hai sir.
Customer: Gujarat ke aas pass. Bharuch hai Surat hai Vapi hai then Baroda hai Ahmedabad hai Rajkot ka ek mere ko matlab Rajkot ka mera kam ka acha lead hai.
Executive: Aisa. To thoda sa sir service industry hai aap aap khud dekho sir aisa nahi lead khani nahi hai sir PAN card ke lead ko consume abhi aap mat kariye sir aapko lag raha hai ki woh jyada kam ki nahi hai sir aap unhi leads ko consume kariye jo aapko lagta hai relevant hai aapki catalog pe jisse aapko kam karne ke kuch fayda hone wala hai sir.
Customer: Kyunki PAN card to kaise kaise waha pe.
Executive: Aapka shubh naam kya hai?
Customer: Mera naam Parth hai sir Parth.
Executive: Sorry.
Customer: Parth naam hai sir Parth. Parth ji main aapko wohi batana chahta hun ki sir abhi ye PAN card ka aap bol rahe hain ki main chalo woh jo inquiries hai usko main crack karu no problem sir barabar lekin sir usme bhi aap PAN card mein bhi agar koi UP ka hai Bihar ka hai unka bhi koi documents proper nahi hota hai barabar hai and call karta hun to woh call uthate nahi hai matlab aise sabhi problems mere ko face karne padte hain and sir abhi ye aapko bhi pata hai kya PAN card ke liye mere ko 500 rupay ya 700 rupay se upar main charge nahi kar sakta hun.
Executive: Nahi sir bilkul sahi bol rahe hain.
Customer: Aur mere pass jo hai ye matlab mera jo ek ek work order jo hota hai woh 5 lakh 7 lakh 2 lakh itna hota hai sir abhi main woh PAN card ke piche padu to mera kam baki ka reh jayega na sir.
Executive: Isliye ek kam karta hun sir main Vimal ko bhi bolta hun jaise ki aapko kuch agar hand pick karke hum leads bhijwa paye sir kyunki aap to time de hi rahe ho aap PAN card pe agar jyada time invest karenge to utna output aapko nahi aayega is baat se main agree karta hun.
Customer: Nahi aayega sir.
Executive: Badi leads hongi sir jaise company incorporation ho gaya export aapka kam hai sir hai na export import ho gaya aapka.
Customer: Export import ka main certificate nikalta hun sir mera export import ka jo hai.
Executive: Export import certificate hai okay okay.
Customer: Haan woh main certificate nikalta hun sir. Sir woh bhi bahut chota si kam hai sir woh bhi 1000 2000 usme aap aap time.
Customer: Nahi usme usme theek hai usme nahi kuch import export mein bhi matlab hum log 5 10000 charge karte hain usme mere ko dikkat nahi hai sir lekin 500 rupay ke liye ye party ke sath mein follow up karna hai fir unke documents kisi ke pass adhar card nahi hota hai ya kisi ke pass PAN card nahi sorry baki ka details nahi hota hai fir woh mere ko 10 phone karenge sab mere pass ye nahi hai woh nahi hai mera PAN card gum hua hai lekin ha lekin mere pass abhi uska copy nahi hai.
Executive: Ye regulatory compliance services ek lead aayi hai hamare pass Pune ki sir.
Customer: Sorry.
Executive: Sir regulatory compliance services ye Pune se lead hai.
Customer: Haan abhi dekho ab. Nahi Pune ka hai right abhi.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji sun raha hun sun raha hun sir.
Executive: Sir sir abhi Pune ka hai to abhi Pune mein main nahi kar sakta hun sir kam kaj. Kyun nahi kar sakta hun uska kya uska reason hai sir abhi waha ke jo officers hai woh mere first thing kya hai woh matlab hamare matlab contact mein nahi hote second thing agar mere ko koi bhi government office mein kam se kam char se panch chakkar lagana padta hai tab jaake kam hota hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Aur mere pass abhi jo kam kaj chalu hai ye sab chod ke fir mere ko agar Pune 10 chakkar lagana pade to uska koi meaning nahi hai sir.
Executive: Fire NOC service theek aapke kam ka hai sir.
Customer: Haan fire ka NOC hum log kar sakte hain. Ahmedabad ki requirement hai sir yaha pe.
Customer: Haan fire NOC ka hum kam kar sakte hain aisa koi dikkat nahi hai abhi dekho PAN card ka bhi mere ko aaya hai ek ghante pehle woh West Bengal ka aaya hai fir teen ghante pehle aaya hai.
Executive: Gujarat sir aap kya kara kariye sir aap ek filter hai waha pe Gujarat ka filter waha pe mark kariye to main jo bhi lead hongi Gujarat ki main samajh raha hun sir aapke pass sari sahi leads nahi aayengi lekin at least aapko ye to dikhega Gujarat se kitni leads generate ho rahi hai to aap jo aapko Gujarat location se dikhe usko hi consume kariye filhal.
Customer: Haan main wohi bol raha hun na agar Gujarat logo agar kam kaj dikhta hai to fir uska meaning hai na sir to baki thoda sir time lagta hai aap samjho sir service industry mein aate hain sir kyunki sir aapka jo kam hai na sir ye product ka nahi hai sir product mein to kya hai sir aapne koi cheez purchase kariye yaha pe sell karne aap baithe hain ye service aap de rahe hain right sir thoda sa time lagta hai isme sir kyunki aapka feedback aaya Vimal ke liye aap satisfied nahi the to maine kaha puchta hun sir Vimal ke in se to kya issue hai.
Customer: Vimal ji kya karne Vimal ji dekho main jab bhi phone karta hun particular Vimal ji ki nahi tha particular jo tha main I am not satisfied with IndiaMART. Mera profile agar dekhenge aapne agar mera profile agar open karenge to aapko malum padega ke jaise FDCA ka license hai fir usme exclusive license hai Gujarat pollution control board hai EPF service hai petroleum exclusive ka hai department of DSIR ka abhi hai to hum panch char char panch panch lakh rupay lete hain sir DSIR mein abhi tak ek bhi mera inquiry nahi aaya hai sir isme. GIDC ke compliance hai fir MSCB jo apna kya bolte hain usko aap log power supply ka kisi ko power supply vagaira chahiye woh hai matlab kehne ka matlab kya hai mera ye sab cheezon mein hamara jyada focus hota hai sir.
Executive: Samajh gaya samajh gaya. Chaliye main ek bar Vimal ko bol dena ek bar catalog mein jo corrections hai woh ek bar kara deta hun sir Vimal aapko ek bar dobara se call kar lega lead hum jis tarike se aapko whatsapp vagaira mein bhej sakte hain aur Gujarat sorry sorry main bol raha hun Gujarat location ki hi leads hum aapko provide karenge sir theek hai. Haan Gujarat Gujarat ki agar aap karenge to better rahega lekin Gujarat ki bhi lead mere pass nahi aa rahi hai mere ko bataya aapke catalog ko ek bar review karke aapke whatsapp number pe jo relevant leads humko dikh rahi hai aapke catalog pe woh bhijwa paunga sir Vimal aapko ek bar reach out kar lenge ji second thing kya hai sir kam se kam agar koi inquiry aati hai to mere ko ek SMS aana chahiye ya fir koi whatsapp aana chahiye ki there.
Executive: SMS ka sir pehle tha woh band ho gaya abhi kya hai na sir koi bhi inquiry aayegi uska notification aayega aapke application pe plus aapko ek mail bhi aata hai do do cheeze hain sir.
Executive: Ji. To ek bari Vimal ko bolta hun sir call karne ke liye sir ek bari jo correction hai catalog mein woh karwa dete hain sir.
Customer: Abhi abhi abhi aap abhi abhi ghante ke baad mein karwaiye kyunki actually abhi ghante ke baad sir. Ji ji. Koi koi problem nahi hai sir main ek bar catalog aapka review karwa deta hun sir agar usme kuch updation required hoga woh karwa ke main aapko bhejta hun. Theek theek theek hai okay thank you kyunki sir feedback aaya.
summary:
Concerns:

- Getting PAN card related inquiries only.

- Inquiries are from different states.

- Fake inquiries, no proper response.

- Wants leads from Gujarat only.

- No SMS notification for inquiries.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to provide Gujarat location leads.

- Executive will review the catalog.

- Executive will ask Vimal to call back.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send relevant leads on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, catalog, pan card, sms
